hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I say 'Woof! Woof!' Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. Who am I?

hints.text: 💦 I like to swim in a pond.

animal.question: I oink and like to play in mud. Who am I?
I say 'Moo!' and give milk. Who am I?
I neigh and you can ride on me. Who am I?
I have a long trunk and big ears. Who am I?

hints.text: 🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I swing in trees and eat bananas. Who am I?
I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. Who am I?
I have black and white stripes. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat grass on the plains.

cosmos.question: I am big and yellow and shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of a banana
⏰ I come out when you wake up

cosmos.question: I am round and sometimes you see me at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌚 I shine at night, but I don't make my own light.

cosmos.question: I twinkle in the night sky and I am very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am a point of light
🔭 You can see many of me with a telescope
🌌 I am part of a group called a constellation

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock and water, and you live here. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 This is where your house is.
🌍 I am blue and green from space.
🌱 Plants and animals live on me.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth once. Sometimes you see the sun, sometimes you see the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🔄 It takes 24 hours for me to happen.
🌗 I have a light part and a dark part.

cosmos.question: I am a big, hot ball of gas that gives off light and heat, and the Earth goes around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give Earth light and heat.
🌞 The Sun is one of me, but very close!
✨ I look like a bright dot during the day, but I am much bigger.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 One of me is called Ursa Major, or the Big Bear.
🌌 You can find patterns in the night sky by finding me.
🌠 People tell stories related to me.

cosmos.question: I am a place far away, beyond our planet, where all the stars and planets live. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I contain everything: stars, planets, and galaxies.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that flies through space. As I approach the sun I leave a bright tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can be seen from Earth when near the Sun.
❄️ I am made of frozen gas, dust, and rock.
💨 I have a bright tail when I get close to the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a vast collection of stars, planets, gas, and dust, all held together by gravity. Our sun is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 Our solar system belongs to the Milky Way, which is a type of me.
